.class public auto ansi RichTextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TextBoxBase implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild

summary.span: 表示对 对象进行操作的丰富编辑控件。

span.span: Represents a rich editing control which operates on objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 唯一支持的子元素。 is the only supported child element for a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 具有对冒泡 和 事件的内置处理。 has built-in handling for the bubbling and events. 因此，永远不会调用用于侦听 `MouseUp` 或 `MouseDown` 事件的自定义事件处理程序。Consequently, custom event handlers that listen for `MouseUp` or `MouseDown` events from a will never be called. 如果需要响应这些事件，请侦听隧道 和 事件，或使用 参数注册处理程序（此选项仅可通过代码使用）。If you need to respond to these events, listen for the tunneling and events instead, or register the handlers with the argument (this latter option is only available through code). 不要将事件标记为已处理，除非你有意禁用这些事件 本机处理，并注意这对控件的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]有显著影响。Do not mark the event handled unless you deliberately want to disable native handling of these events, and be aware that this has notable effects on the control's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 虽然 支持复制和粘贴图像，但目前不支持某些方案，可能无法正常工作。While supports copying and pasting of images, certain scenarios are currently unsupported and may not work properly. 下表总结了这些方案和预期结果。The following table summarizes these scenarios and expected results. |图像复制源Image Copy Source|图像粘贴结果Image Paste Result| |-----------------------|------------------------| |图像源是图形图元文件Image source is a graphic metafile|未粘贴任何图像No image is pasted| |图像源使用相对路径或链接Image source uses relative path or link|粘贴了乱帖或空白图像Garbled or blank image is pasted| |图像源链接不是以预期的图像格式（。PNG、。JPG、。GIFImage source link does not end with an expected image format (.PNG, .JPG, .GIF)|粘贴了乱帖或空白图像Garbled or blank image is pasted| |从格式错误的格式文本复制的图像源（RTF）Image source copied from malformed RichText (RTF)|粘贴链接到图像源（而不是图像）Link to image source is pasted (rather than image)| 将 HTML 内容粘贴到 可能会导致意外行为，因为 使用 RTF 格式，而不是直接使用 HTML 格式。Pasting HTML content into a might result in unexpected behavior because uses RTF format rather than directly using HTML format. 文本始终换 。Text always wraps in a . 如果您不希望文本换行，请将 上的 设置为大于 的宽度。If you do not want text to wrap then set the on the to be larger than the width of the . 但是，一旦达到页面宽度，文本仍会换行。However, once the page width is reached the text still wraps. 使用 和 属性，在 中水平和垂直对齐内容。Horizontally and vertically aligning content within a is done with the and properties. 对齐页面布局中的 是通过 和 属性来完成的。Aligning the within the layout of the page is done with the and properties. 默认情况下，滚动条在 上不可见。Scrollbars are not visible on a by default. 若要使滚动条可见，请将 属性设置为 或 。To make a scrollbar visible, set the property to or . 通常情况下，应使用 事件来检测 中的文本或 更改，而不是像预期那样 。Usually, the event should be used to detect when the text in a or changes, rather then as you might expect. 有关示例，请参阅[如何：在文本框中的文本发生更改时进行检测](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed)。For an example, see [How to: Detect When Text in a TextBox Has Changed](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-detect-when-text-in-a-textbox-has-changed). 支持多种键盘命令。 supports a variety of keyboard commands. 有关键盘命令的列表，请参阅 。For a list of keyboard commands, see . 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例声明一个包含简单 的 。The following example declares a that contains a simple . [!code-xaml[RichTextBoxSnippets#_RTB_XAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_rtb_xaml)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#RichTextBoxCodeOnlyExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/RichTextBoxExample.cs#richtextboxcodeonlyexample)] [!code-vb[RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#RichTextBoxCodeOnlyExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RichTextBoxMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/richtextboxexample.vb#richtextboxcodeonlyexample)]
